activities: Staples Promotional Products hosts websites that sell promotional merchandise over the internet. We receive ‘Ship To’ addresses along with payment information. We will also collect the customers e-mail address for order confirmation. If the customer opts in the e-mail address will be used for marketing purposes only. Staples doesn’t sell or share this data outside of the need to fulfill the order.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client - online, Telephony (customer provided manual entry), offline - mailed in order forms
recoursemech: For Dispute Resolution, Staples agrees to cooperate with JAMS. This is the JAMS website:  http://www.jamsadr.com/
